Hire 360 Photo Booth Today

Elevate your upcoming event, Brand Activation, Wedding, or any Corporate Event in Sydney to a new dimension of entertainment with ONE360’s cutting-edge photo booth hire services. Ready to add a burst of energy to your event? With ONE360, we turn ordinary moments into extraordinary experiences that your guests will love.

From start to finish, we bring the fun with interactive 360° videos, instantly shareable on social media, giving everyone a chance to relive and share the excitement.

FAQs.

How does the ONE360 Photo Booth work?

The ONE360 Photo Booth captures stunning 360-degree videos using a rotating camera. Guests step onto the platform, and the camera moves around them, creating dynamic slow-motion or boomerang-style videos that can be shared instantly.

Do you offer photo booth hire for events across Sydney?

Yes! We provide 360 photo booth hire across Sydney, including weddings, corporate events, birthdays, and brand activations. Our team ensures a seamless experience at any venue in the Sydney area.

Can we customise the videos with our branding or event theme?

Absolutely! We offer custom overlays, logos, animations, and backgrounds to match your event’s theme or corporate branding. Let us know your vision, and we’ll personalise the experience for you.

How quickly do guests receive their videos?

Guests can receive their videos instantly via QR code, text message, or email. Our booth is equipped with fast-sharing technology, making it easy for everyone to post their videos on social media right away.

5. How much space is required for the ONE360 Photo Booth?

For the best experience, we recommend a minimum space of 3m x 3m. If your Sydney venue has space constraints, let us know in advance, and we’ll find a way to accommodate.

Do you provide an attendant with the booth?

Yes! A professional booth attendant will be present at your event in Sydney to assist guests, manage the booth, and ensure everything runs smoothly.

How do I book ONE360 Photo Booth for my event?

Booking is easy—just reach out through our website or contact us directly, and we’ll help you secure your event date and answer any additional questions.
